enhanced_description: Altair specializes in computational intelligence, offering advanced software and cloud solutions for simulation, high-performance computing (HPC), and artificial intelligence (AI). Leveraging computational science, Altair aims to drive innovation and sustainability globally, enabling organizations in nearly every industry to compete more effectively. Key offerings include Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence capabilities, Design and Simulation tools, and the Altair One Cloud Innovation Gateway powered by a flexible Altair Units licensing model. The platform, including Altair® RapidMiner®, is designed to accelerate AI adoption by connecting data, people, and processes, and offers flexible cloud and hybrid computing solutions to break out of traditional data center limitations.
